sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +5% Damage Reduction when affected by Crowd Control

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that fires a Barbed Shot at 100% effectiveness. Casting Bestial Wrath always hits a Jackpot!

Set: Hitting a Jackpot! infuses your pet with a mutagen, causing its auto-attacks to deal 17,801 Nature damage to its target and up to 5 enemies within 10 yds for 8 sec. Mutagenic attacks reduce the cooldown of Bestial Wrath by 0.3 sec.

spells.description: Equip: Your gear cools with Woven Duskthread and gains 756 Versatility when over 80% health.
